snippet.title: Fablecraft | Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Fablecraft is a vibrant and hopeful cooperative digital tabletop roleplaying game that’s easy to pick up and play with your friends on any device, in-person or remote. Gather your group of Mages and a GM, and embark on adventures you’ll never forget.

SUPPORT OUR KICKSTARTER: https://bit.ly/3TbwVlv
FOLLOW us on social: https://beacons.ai/fablecraft 
JOIN us on Discord: https://discord.gg/fablecraft 
LEARN MORE: http://www.playfablecraft.com

Fablecraft is a brand new tabletop roleplaying game designed to lower the barrier-to-entry for TTRPGs. Our digital platform makes it easy to GM or play, with integrated video, audio, and text chat; seamless character creation and built-in adventure notes; math-free dice rolls and interactive battlemaps. 

Fablecraft is set in a land called Mythas, where magic infuses all things and nature runs wild. Shepherd your party of Mages through a world of mystery, magic, and mayhem, and bring your stories to life using a library of artwork, music, sound, and battle scenes. Our ready-to-play modules are designed to be played over five sessions of around 90-120 minutes each, or you can homebrew your own.

👉SOCIAL MEDIA👈
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/FablecraftGame
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/fablecraftgame/
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@fablecraftgame
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/FablecraftGame/
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/fablecraft 

Subscribe to our channel for game demos, playthroughs, and more! https://www.youtube.com/@fablecraftgame
